] Are we all going to watch the football game at the weekend?? ############################################ ############################################ [Yesterday at 4.33pm from
] Ok sorry guys i think i messed something up, uhh i was playing around with the

i mentioned earlier. I decided to give up like i always do ahahaha sorry about that. I heard these proxy things are supposed to make your website secure but i barely know how to use it so im probably making it more insecure in the process. Might pass it over to the IT guys but in the meantime all the config files are laying about. And since i dont know how it works im not sure how to delete them hope they don't contain any confidential information lol. other than that im pretty sure my backup "music_archive" is safe just to confirm. ############################################ ############################################
